reviewText: The content of this DVD was great! I loved learning more about KG, what he went through in his life, and what he does to give back to the community.

When Kevin Garnett arives in the NBA i know his going to be a great basketball player, a future Hall of Fame...I watch him all of his career, and he deserved his ring for NBA Champion. His my favorite player and i love that his play with the Boston Celtics. Great DVD. GO CELTICS, GO KG...BEST WISHES FROM BOSNIA,PEACE!!!
A genuinely compelling story mixed with some fun basketball footage. While KG himself may fade too frequently in the clutch, his video tends to come through.
Great video showing life of KG!! Shows growing up in Mauldin and move to Chicago. Loved it!!

For those who love KG(Kevin Garnett). THIS IS A MUST DVD TO HAVE. I love Kevin Garnett ever since the day he got drafted right out of High School to the NBA and to start with the Minnesota Timberwolves. This DVD has pretty much the story oh him growing up in South Carolina and then moving to Chicago with his mom Shirley and his sisters Sonya and Ashley Garnett. Plus talks about him going to a legendary team the Boston Celtics and how he won his first championship. KG is a player to like and you will probably would say I want to meet this guy, lol I'm a huge Kevin Garnett fan.

This DVD is a must have! It chronicals KG's life and his early years from high school and his time with the Timberwolves. It also has great coverage of KG coming to Boston and the road to the 2008 championship with the Celtics. You will not be dissapointed!

Iloved this dvd! Its a intimate interview with Mr. Garnett himself. Its great footage of him talking about leaving minnesota after playing with them for 10 years and how everyone doubted he'd be able to take the Celtics all the way. Boy were they wrong!! Can you say 2008 NBA champion. 2008 defensive player of the year! Its a must have for any Kevin Garnett fan. It tells a lot about the Big Ticket!
This dvd captures the whole of Kevin Garnett as a player and a person. Truly inspirational and a must have for any basketball fan!

KG was fantastic last season, this season. He is arguabley the best defender in the league I hope this film shows this because KG and the other four starters (Kendric Perkins, Ray Allen, Paul Pierce, Rajon Rondo)are all all-stars
